column4: installed ubuntu on my mac and now my osx partition has gone missing, what should i do?
okay i've restarted with them and i have 3 partitions, disk0s1, 02 and linux swap
i'm scared to install osx just in case i can recover the previous installation?
none of them are original braydenmartindal
it had everything, please tell me there is a way to recover things
i'm sure i selected the partition nt the whole disk
You're not on that machine now, are you?
About $500-$1K if you get stuck and want someone else to do it for you professionally.  These are legitimate companies, not "people on IRC."
i do remember buying a program a few years ago that helped me recver data, but that time no OS was installed
Your partitions are hosed, or so you told us.  You need something that'll scrape the platters.
